pr_title: Add Open Graph metadata to the web site pages

timeline.message:
Add Open Graph metadata to the web site pages

- Added various Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata.
- Added the default card image.
- Set hand-crafted or auto-generated excerpt to `og:description`
  property.
- Removed short-link pages from the site map.
Just in case there's no excerpt
